name: react-native-animated-background-color-view
description: A modified React Native 'View' component that animates it's 'backgroundColor' when 'color' prop changes.

scripts.eslint: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint src/ && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m ESLINT \x1b[0m" No JavaScript ESLint errors to fix
scripts.eslint:fix: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --fix src/ && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m ESLINT \x1b[0m" ESLint JavaScript errors fixed
scripts.lib:build: ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir lib && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m BABEL \x1b[0m" Library built
scripts.lib:clean: rm -rf lib/ && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m CLEAN \x1b[0m" Library directory removed
scripts.lib:copy-package-json: cp package.json lib/ && cp README.md lib/ && echo "\x1b[102\x1b[1m COPY \x1b[0m" Copied package.json to library
scripts.lib:delete-tests: find lib/ -name '**test**' -delete && echo "\x1b[102\x1b[1m DELETE \x1b[0m" Removed tests from library
scripts.lib:prepublish: npm run --silent eslint:fix && npm run --silent lib:clean && npm run --silent lib:build && npm run --silent lib:delete-tests && npm run --silent lib:copy-package-json
